name: BinaryGrab (Early Access)
description:
It's your first day at a new job, just a low level data mining position for faceless megacorportion BinaryGrab Data Mining Solutions, but still, a job's a job.

Its only a five day temporary contract but the recruitment guy said that aslong as you keep your head down, meet the daily data quota, and dont screw anything up, then when the week's over a permanent position will be yours. Good luck!

(Please note that BinaryGrab is currently in early access with full release planned for Q1 2020. Beta is fully playable.)

Join the discord at: https://discord.gg/MU6efE9
